description.fr:
{%Attack} {#PUSH} la cible de {cell:c} et construit une {FloorMechanism:1843} sur chaque case parcourue.
\---
Lorsqu'il descend sous {value:pv,percent} de sa {%PVMAX,plural:other}\_: Construit une {FloorMechanism:1843} sur les cases en diagonale et invoque {value:inv}\_{Summoning:848,value:inv!}.
description.en:
{%Attack} {#PUSH} the target {cell:c} and builds one {FloorMechanism:1843} on each cell covered.
\---
On falling below {value:pv,percent} {%PVMAX,plural:other}: Builds one {FloorMechanism:1843} on the diagonal free cells and summons {value:inv}\_{Summoning:848,value:inv!}.
description.es:
{%Attack} {#PUSH} al objetivo {cell:c} y construye una {FloorMechanism:1843} en cada casilla recorrida.
\---
Cuando tiene menos del {value:pv,percent} de su {%PVMAX,plural:other}: Construye una {FloorMechanism:1843} en las casillas en diagonal e invoca {value:inv}\_{Summoning:848,value:inv!}.
description.de:
{%Attack} {#PUSH} das Ziel {cell:c} zurück und errichtet 1\_{FloorMechanism:1843} auf jedem überquerten Feld.
\---
Wenn er unter {value:pv,percent} seiner {%PVMAX,plural:other} fällt: Errichtet 1\_{FloorMechanism:1843} auf den diagonalen Feldern und beschwört {value:inv}\_{Summoning:848,value:inv!}.
description.pt:
{%Attack} {#PUSH} o alvo por {cell:c} e posiciona uma {FloorMechanism:1843} sobre cada célula percorrida.
\---
Quando ele vai abaixo de {value:pv,percent} dos seus {%PVMAX,plural:other}: Posiciona uma {FloorMechanism:1843} sobre as células em diagonal e invoca {value:inv}\_{Summoning:848,value:inv!}.
